title.narrative: Support to PIFS Pacific Plan Office

description.narrative: The Pacific Plan provides a framework for advancing national and regional capacity by promoting cooperation, integration, and provision of public goods and services. Political oversight and guidance of the Pacific Plan is provided by the Pacific Plan Action Committee (PPAC) which comprises all Forum members and associate members (French Polynesia and New Caledonia). The PPAC Chair reports to Leaders on implementation of the Plan. Funding under this initiative provides support for coordinating the implementation of the Pacific Plan; and mentor the new Pacific Plan Advisor. The secondment support PIFS strategic thinking on regional cooperation and integration and manage the engagement with non-state actors and other key donors. The position reports to the Director Strategic Partnership and Coordination at PIFS. The total value of this initiative is $0.4 million over 3 years, starting 2011-12.
